Code: EXEC SQL SELECT NUM_APOLICE, NRENDOS, NUM_ITEM, RAMOFR, MODALIFR, COD_COBERTURA, PCT_COBERTURA, DATA_INIVIGENCIA, DATA_TERVIGENCIA FROM seguros.v1coberapol WHERE num_apolice = :NUM_APOLICE AND nrendos = :NRENDOS AND num_item = 0 AND cod_cobertura = 0 ORDER BY num_apolice, nrendos, ramofr, modalifr END SQL
